LockedAndLoaded:Firewall.NAME: Firewall
LockedAndLoaded:Firewall.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Lock-On and Channel 1 Awakening.
LockedAndLoaded:Firewall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Lock-On and Channel 1 Awakening.

LockedAndLoaded:Multithreaded.NAME: Multithreaded
LockedAndLoaded:Multithreaded.DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next orb. NL If any enemy has Lock-On, Channel !M! of the Orb that was Evoked.
LockedAndLoaded:Multithreaded.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evoke your next orb. NL If any enemy has Lock-On, Channel !M! of the Orb that was Evoked.

LockedAndLoaded:Singularity.NAME: Singularity
LockedAndLoaded:Singularity.DESCRIPTION: Awakening orbs now make enemies lose Strength.

LockedAndLoaded:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
LockedAndLoaded:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !LockedAndLoaded:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

LockedAndLoaded:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
LockedAndLoaded:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !LockedAndLoaded:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
